messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

device recovery report printer alert duplex unit is not set device recovery report printer duplex unit printer ready details copier busy details scanner busy details model name device name comment host name printer name print name file name printer name zone name name computer name share name device printer printer notified

message.reasoning:
**Classifying IT ticket**

I need to categorize an IT ticket into one of the provided categories: "Hardware," "HR Support," "Access," "Miscellaneous," "Storage," "Purchase," "Internal Project," or "Administrative rights." The ticket text involves issues with printers, devices, and recovery reports, suggesting it's related to hardware. Although "Administrative rights" or "Access" were initial thoughts, they don't fit as well. So, I'll classify it under "Hardware." The output will be formatted as a JSON object.**Preparing IT ticket response**

The instruction clearly states to categorize the IT ticket, and the response format is defined as a JSON object. It must include the category field, so I'll respond with `{"category":"Hardware"}`. I need to ensure it follows the required schema with the appropriate properties and types outlined. To keep things straightforward, I'll avoid any extra text and stick solely to the JSON object format for the output. So let's finalize this!
